--- title: Implementing nbdev keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Some new library for experimenting with" ---

Here we've implemented a new function called say_hello

Install¶

pip install implementingnbdev

How to use¶

For now we just have the one function say_hello This prints out a simple statement when passed a name

say_hello("Leanne")

'Hello Leanne!'
say_hello("Rue")

'Hello Rue!'

New_fun¶

This enables you to add 2 numbers together and returns the sum.

new_fun(1,2)

3
new_fun(2,3)

5

Takeaway functionality¶

This enables a new function

takeaway(3,4)

1
